Description: You are bidding on a 1971/2 Gibson Deluxe. This guitar features some of the best sounding pickups with the embossed Gibson logo (only offered in 1971/2). This generation of SG is known as type IIi and are identified as "Paddleheads" due to the large headstock shape. These ugly duckling “Paddlehead” SG’s have become very popular with the collector community, and the SG Deluxe , with the thin 70's neck, Stock Bigsby and killer pickups is one of the most popular ! This particular guitar is in Very Good (Heavily modded) condition-it has had some extensive work done to it including a cool professional re-finish in a light metallic grey (looks green in the pictures, but its grey)-the CC covers have been re created in chrome as well as the pickguard. The Gibson serial number is still visable thru the finsh and Grover imperial tuners fill out the restoration. The result is a 70's rockin guitar with a modern feel-the guitar plays great and sounds awesome ! The guitar looks great ! age (45!) Its set up and ready to ROCK-no wall hanger here ! We have provided detailed pictures of this guitar-let your eyes be the judge...if you need additional information or picts of this guitar, just message me-no problem.If your looking for a lightly relic'ed , mojo dripping, original 70's era authentic GIBSON guitar that will not break the bank, here it is ! The best part is that this guitar is a blast to play and sounds great ! Perfect guitar for a restore or just keep it and play the sh** out of it ! Dont settle for a run of the mill SG-go vintage ! Its a great looking head turner and a fantastic sounding guitar !. Ships in a newer Vintage Epiphone hard shell case (case is in excellent condition) Someone is going to get a fantastic bargain on this one, as I am out of room and have to sell some guitars... I have tons of feedback, will answer all questions so bid with confidence.... Shipping is a flat rate of $40 and includes professional packing and insurance via UPS Ground. SORRY...no international shipping. We accept Paypal and we can only ship to Paypal confirmed address..... Check out our impeccable feedback rating and bid with confidence.
Title: Vintage (1971/2) Gibson SG Delux Electric Guitar  custom #220!
